sections.heading: to 1-6A-12 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1999, ch. 267, § 36 repealed 1-6A-1 to 1-6A-12 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1993, ch. 37, §§ 1 to 9 and Laws 1995, ch. 165, §§ 4 to 6 and as amended by Laws 1995, ch. 165, §§ 1 to 3, relating to absentee-early voting, effective June 18, 1999. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1998 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
